name: Bear Simulator 3D Madness
description:
Bear Simulator has finally arrived! Control this Bear through 2 levels of total bear chaos. Find and rescue all the captured bears. Rampage the streets of the city. Smash up some cars. Slam through some boxes and crates.

Then take a stroll through the countryside. Locate all the locked up bears. Find the Giant Bear walking around. Don't forget to say hello to the big guy. Smash up some tents and helicopters. Interact with plenty of other animals such as Goats, Horses, and Sheep running around. All in fun 3D graphics. Watch out for those Bear traps - it will end your game early.

Its total bear destruction. You've played goat simulator, now give this Bear a test drive. Fun 3D Bear simulator action straight to your mobile device.

Bears. Some call them the number one threat to America. Others call them gentle giants. For all those fans of goat simulator looking something a little different, give this Bear Simulator a try.
